participantOriginIdentificationCategory.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

financialInstrumentIdentificationExchang.description: Identifier code of the exchange where the instrument is listed

segment.description: Market segment - first level of market classification in post-trading process
segment.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalSegmentCode

market.description: Market type - second level of market classification in post-trading process
market.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalMarketCode

isin.description: International Securities Identification Number - Standardized international code for unique identification of financial instruments
isin.$comment: Structure BR AAAA BBB CC D where: BR=Brazil country code, AAAA=issuer identification (alphanumeric), BBB=asset type (alphanumeric), CC=species or sequence (alphanumeric), D=check digit (numeric)

tickerSymbol.description: Letters that identify stocks traded on stock exchange

optionType.description: Option type identification. CALL (right to buy underlying asset) or PUTT (right to sell underlying asset)
optionType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalOptionTypeCode

expirationCode.description: Expiration code of a Future or an Option

currentFactor.description: Rate expressed as a decimal between 0 and 1 defining the outstanding principal of the financial instrument (for factored securities)

exercisePrice.description: Monetary amount of the exercise price with high precision (up to 10 decimal places)

tradeTransactionType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalTradeTransactionTypeCode

tradeSubType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalTradeSubTypeCode

strategyType.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalStrategyTypeCode

dealPrice.description: Decimal number with up to 6 decimal places

buySellIndicator.description: Indicates whether the trade is a buy or sell
buySellIndicator.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalBuySellIndicatorCode

tradingSessionIdentification.description: Indicates if trade was executed during regular hours or after market
tradingSessionIdentification.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalTradingSessionIdCode

tradeRegistrationOrigin.description: Origin session code for the trade

tradingSessionSubIdentification.description: Identifies the phase group in trading session
tradingSessionSubIdentification.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalTradingSessionSubIdCode

securityTradingStatus.description: Identifies the instrument phase in trading
securityTradingStatus.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalSecurityTradingStatusCode

strategySymbol.description: Strategy symbol identifier. Letters that identify stocks traded on stock exchange

shortFuturePrice.description: Short future value with up to 6 decimal places
shortFuturePrice.$comment: Represents the price of the short future leg in the strategy

longFuturePrice.description: Long future value with up to 6 decimal places
longFuturePrice.$comment: Represents the price of the long future leg in the strategy

delta.description: Delta value with up to 6 decimal places
delta.$comment: Represents the rate of change between the derivative price and the underlying asset price

compressionGroupIndicator.description: Indicates if the operation is derived from block capture
compressionGroupIndicator.$comment: When true, the trade was part of a block trade

averagePriceGroupIndicator.description: Indicates if the operation is derived from an average price allocation group
averagePriceGroupIndicator.$comment: When true, the trade was part of an average price group

averageExecutionTime.description: Average execution time of the average price allocation group

accountOriginIdentification.description: Account identifier for give up account

participantDestinationIdentificationId.description: Participant identifier for take up participant

participantDestinationIdentificationCate.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalParticipantCategoryCode

accountDestinationIdentification.description: Account identifier defined by the participant

giveUpOnCaptureIndicator.description: Indicates if the give up was originated due to a trade capture

previousAllocationIdentification.description: Identifies the control number of a previous allocation related to this one

status.$comment: Consult External Code List table ExternalTradeStatusCode

breakingRuleIndicator.description: Indicates if the operation was requested outside the time limit
breakingRuleIndicator.$comment: When true, indicates a rule break that requires justification
